GenericVisitTaskContext.name: GenericVisitTaskContext
GenericVisitTaskContext.description: Represents the context or purpose for a generic visit task.

ContextId.description: The ID of the record thatâ€™s taken as the context for the visit task. For example, if a key performance indicator is recorded for a warranty of an asset, the Asset and the Warranty records are the contexts of the visit task.

DefinitionReferenceId.description: The definition record associated with the runtime record. The value is null when the definition record is created.

Description.description: The description of the visit task context.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the visit task context in a visit.

IsDefinition.description: Indicates whether the record is a definition record.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the visit task context associated with the record is mandatory.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated unique identifier for the visit task context record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the visit task context record owner.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the visit task context in a visit.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the visit task context.

StatusCode.description: Specifies the status code of the visit task context.

VisitId.description: The visit associated with the record.
